name: york
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a city in northern England: The beautiful city of York, forty-five minutes from the hotel, has a famous Minster and the popular Jorvik (Viking) Centre. Flood alerts are in place for York and for other areas of North Yorkshire.
More examplesFewer examplesOn a clear day, you can see the towers of York Minster glinting 60 miles away in the sunlight. York's Jorvik Viking Centre brings the Viking era to life. At the time, she was a research fellow at the University of York.York is a compact city packed full of exciting, unmissable experiences.
